lead_paragraph: Eric Staal broke a tie for host Carolina with 4 minutes 9 seconds left, and Ray Whitney scored twice to help give Paul Maurice his first victory in his second coaching stint with the Hurricanes, 3-1, over Washington. Michael Leighton finished with 38 saves.
